TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SoapMessage extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示特定 的 SOAP 要求或 SOAP 回應中的資料。

span.span: Represents the data in a SOAP request or SOAP response at a specific .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要用途類別是針對 SOAP 擴充功能，表示 SOAP 要求或 SOAP 回應中的資料。The primary use of the class is for SOAP extensions, representing the data in a SOAP request or SOAP response. 當呼叫方法時，接收在每個。When the method is called, a receives a at each . 負責決定特定的 SOAP 擴充功能，來選擇如何處理。It is up to the particular SOAP extension to choose how to process the . 常見的 SOAP 延伸模組包含加密和壓縮。Common SOAP extensions include encryption and compression. SOAP 延伸模組可以套用至這兩個 XML Web 服務方法建立或使用 ASP.NET 或 XML Web 服務用戶端。SOAP extensions can be applied to either or both an XML Web service method created using ASP.NET or an XML Web service client. 當 SOAP 擴充功能套用到 XML Web service 方法，方法會接收的執行個體，其衍生自。When a SOAP extension is applied to an XML Web service method, the method receives an instance of , which derives from . 同樣地，當 SOAP 擴充功能套用至 XML Web 服務用戶端接收執行個體。Likewise, when a SOAP extension is applied to an XML Web service client, receives an instance of . ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapMessage#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessage/CPP/SoapMessage.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapMessage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessage/CS/soapmessage.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapMessage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessage/VB/soapmessage.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 HTTP 標頭的內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the contents of the HTTP header.
The contents of the HTTP header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以設定的 SOAP 擴充功能屬性提供的編碼方式相關之 SOAP 訊息而不需要變更的媒體類型所表示的補充資訊`Content-Type`HTTP 標頭。A SOAP extension can set the property to provide supplementary information about the encoding of a SOAP message without changing the media type as expressed in the `Content-Type` HTTP header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性只可以存取在和階段; 否則就會擲回。The property can only be accessed in the and stages; otherwise, an is thrown. 使用屬性，而不是屬性以提供 SOAP 訊息的編碼方式相關的補充資訊。Use the property, instead of the property to provide supplementary information about the encoding of a SOAP message. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapMessage#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessage/CPP/SoapMessage.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[SoapMessage#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessage/CS/soapmessage.cs#3)] [!code-vb[SoapMessage#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessage/VB/soapmessage.vb#3)]

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，判斷提示 (Assert) 目前的 是可以取得 in 參數的階段。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, asserts that the current is a stage where in parameters are available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 判斷提示的階段是不同的 XML Web 服務用戶端和 XML Web 服務方法。The asserted stage is different for XML Web service clients and XML Web service methods. SOAP 要求會在還原序列化之後，會提供 XML Web 服務方法的參數中階段。An XML Web service method's in parameters are available after the SOAP request is deserialized in the stage. XML Web 服務用戶端中，參數可以使用的 SOAP 要求序列化程序，在之前階段。For an XML Web service client, the in parameters are available prior to the SOAP request serialization process in the stage. 可以在任何呼叫，但是中擲回時不使用參數。 can be called during any , however an is thrown when in parameters are not available.

exception.span: 無法取得 in 參數。

span.span: In parameters are not available.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void EnsureOutStage() cil managed

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，判斷提示目前的 階段是可以取得 out 參數的階段。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, asserts that the current stage is a stage where out parameters are available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 判斷提示的階段是不同的 XML Web 服務用戶端和 XML Web 服務方法。The asserted stage is different for XML Web service clients and XML Web service methods. XML Web 服務方法的輸出參數會在 SOAP 回應序列化程序之前，您可以使用階段。An XML Web service method's out parameters are available prior to the SOAP response serialization process in the stage. 在 XML Web 服務用戶端，out 參數後可用的 SOAP 回應還原序列化程序中階段。In an XML Web service client, the out parameters are available after the SOAP response deserialization process in the stage. 可以在任何呼叫，但是時擲回參數不可以使用。 can be called during any , however an is thrown when out parameters are not available.

exception.span: 無法取得 out 參數。

span.span: Out parameters are not available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 標頭是 SOAP 要求或 SOAP 回應的選擇性部分。SOAP headers are an optional portion of a SOAP request or SOAP response. 如需有關如何使用 ASP.NET 和其用戶端所建立的 XML Web service 中使用 SOAP 標頭的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more details on using SOAP headers in XML Web services created using ASP.NET and their clients, see the class. 雖然屬性可以在任何階段存取，則只會填入中的 SOAP 標頭資訊和階段。Although the property can be accessed at any stage, it is only populated with the SOAP header information in the and stages.

One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如、屬性一定會有效之後階段。For a , the property is guaranteed to be valid after the stage. 在屬性為可用，不過 SOAP 訊息處理不完全，而且可能會改變內容的 SOAP 訊息的 SOAP 擴充功能尚未執行的階段。In the stage the property is available, however the SOAP message has not been completely processed and SOAP extensions that may alter the contents of the SOAP message have not run.

summary.span: 取得以 形式表示的 SOAP 要求或 SOAP 回應的資料。

span.span: Gets the data representing the SOAP request or SOAP response in the form of a .
A read-only instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檢查代表 SOAP 要求或 SOAP 回應，例如 SOAP 延伸模組，記錄資料的 SOAP 擴充功能可以使用`Stream`屬性可在每個檢視資料。SOAP extensions that inspect the data representing a SOAP request or SOAP response, such as a logging SOAP extension, can use the `Stream` property to view the data at each . 修改的資料代表 SOAP 要求或 SOAP 回應，例如加密或壓縮 SOAP 延伸模組的 SOAP 擴充功能應該這樣做與傳入方法。SOAP extensions that modify the data representing a SOAP request or SOAP response, such as encryption or compression SOAP extensions, should do so with the passed into the method of . 屬性傳入處於唯讀狀態。The property of passed into is read-only. 如需有關如何修改資料表示為 SOAP 要求或 SOAP 回應的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on modifying the data representing a SOAP request or SOAP response, see . ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapMessage_Headers#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessage_Headers/CPP/SoapMessage_Headers.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[SoapMessage_Headers#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessage_Headers/CS/soapmessage_headers.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SoapMessage_Headers#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessage_Headers/VB/soapmessage_headers.vb#2)]
